quotes.quote: A penny saved is not a penny earned if at the end of the day you still owe a quarter.
Tough times call for tough choices and pinching every penny.
Be not penny-wise. Riches have wings. Sometimes they fly away of themselves, and sometimes they must be set flying to bring in more.
A penny saved is two pence clear, A pin a day's a groat a year
A penny saved is a penny to squander.
It may be a penny for your thoughts, but it is now a quarter for your voice.
A penny is a lot of money, if you have not got a penny.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
Penny wise is often pound foolish.
Geniuses sometimes end up very unhappy, without a penny.
A penny saved is two pence clear.
Money can't buy life.
The key to making money is to stay invested.
If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man.
You reach a point where you don't work for money.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
Money and salary is not a particularly good motivator in the long term.
Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.
Money may not buy happiness, but it can damn well give it!
Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
There are some things that you can fulfil with money, but at the end of the day these are not the things that make you happy. It is the small things that make life good. 0
Never spend your money before you have earned it.
It’s good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it’s good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven’t lost the things that money can’t buy.
Many folks think they aren’t good at earning money, when what they don’t know is how to use it.
A penny saved is worthless
